document_title: Acute liver failure: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
Acute liver failure is not common, but its complications are extremely dangerous, even leading to multi-organ dysfunction and death. Therefore, early prevention is really necessary and important. Some useful instructions to know include:
Vaccination against hepatitis B virus; Limit alcohol consumption, if any, only drink in moderation.; Maintain a healthy weight and a healthy lifestyle.; Read the instructions carefully when using acetaminophen, especially pay attention to using this medicine in people with chronic liver disease or in people addicted to alcohol.; People with hepatitis B and C viruses need to be monitored, managed and treated; Build a nutritious diet with foods that are good for the liver such as coffee, garlic, berries...
Center for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy and Surgery (Tam Anh General Hospital, Ho Chi Minh City) and Department of Gastroenterology - Hepatobiliary - Pancreatic (Tam Anh General Hospital, Hanoi) are prestigious medical centers specializing in Gastroenterology, providing High-end, effective examination and treatment services for patients with mild to severe liver problems (fatty liver, acute and chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, liver failure, chronic liver failure, cancer). liver cancer...). Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of highly specialized and experienced Internal Medicine - Surgery - Gastrointestinal Endoscopy doctors, in addition to the support of a modern medical equipment system imported from abroad. in addition, serving the maximum examination and treatment needs of customers.
